verbose_text: In support of this concept, Price et al. reported that SIRT1 activation is required for AMPK phosphorylation and improvement of mitochondrial function via deacetylation and activation of LKB1, a primary upstream kinase of AMPK [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], while Park et al. found that resveratrol activates SIRT1 via an indirect pathway involving calmodulin dependent protein kinase kinase beta (Camkkbeta) and AMPK activation [XREF_BIBR].
